game.name: Baba Make Parabox
title.game.name: [Baba Make Parabox]
seperator.title: #=--{text:-<60}
launch.open.levelpack: Please input levelpack's filename that you are going to open at below.
launch.open.levelpack.done: Successfully read the data of levelpack from file '{file}'.
launch.open.levelpack.empty.editor: If you leave it empty, the editor will create a new default levelpack.
launch.save.levelpack: Please input levelpack's filename that you are going to save at below.
launch.save.levelpack.done: Successfully saved the data of levelpack to file '{file}'.
launch.save.levelpack.empty.game: If you leave it empty, the game will not save your progress in the levelpack.
launch.save.levelpack.empty.editor: If you leave it empty, the editor will not save the levelpack you made.
launch.save.levelpack.empty.update: If you leave it empty, the game will overwrites the outdated data with the updated data in the levelpack file you choose for update.
launch.change_options.json: Do you have any needs to edit the levelpack files? {lang['confirm.no']}:
launch.change_options.bgm: Do you like to have a background music? {lang['confirm.no']}:
launch.change_options.metatext: Enter metatext's max tier (commonly 1) if you do know what metatext is and you want it, otherwise just enter 0.
launch.change_options.done: The game options has been updated.
launch.exception: During the program running, an exception occur.
launch.exception.report: Please report this bug to the creator of this game.
launch.exception.record: The information of this exception will display below this line, So you should record all of them:
launch.keyboard_interrupt: Noticed that you pressed Ctrl+C, which tells terminal to shut this program.
launch.keyboard_interrupt.insert: Try Ctrl+Insert to copy texts next time.
launch.thank_you: Thank you for playing Baba Make Parabox!
play.win: You have won Baba Make Parabox！
play.level.current.name: Current level's name:
play.level.transform: This level has been transformed into something...
play.world.current.name: Current world's name:
edit.level.current.name: Current level's name:
edit.level.new: Are you sure you want to create a new level? {lang['confirm.yes']}:
edit.level.new.name: Input level's name:
edit.level.new.super_level.name: Input level's super level's name:
edit.level.new.icon.name: Input level icon's filename (for example, text_baba):
edit.level.new.icon.color: Input level icon's color (for example, #114514 or 0x1D4B42):
edit.level.new.is_map: Is this new level a map? {lang['confirm.no']}:
edit.level.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this level? {lang['confirm.no']}:
edit.world.current.name: Current world's name:
edit.world.new: Are you sure you want to create a new world? {lang['confirm.yes']}:
edit.world.new.name: Input world's name:
edit.world.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this world? {lang['confirm.no']}:
input.file.name: Input filename:
warn.value.invalid: WARN: '{val}' is not a valid {cls} value!
warn.value.out_of_range: WARN: {val} is out of range! (min: {min}, max: {max})
